trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were no other sightings in Naples on or around May 11th 2004
Summary: I saw a cigar shaped object in the southern sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was beginning to clean my pool which is on the west side of my home. I lookedup into the southern sky and noticed a dark brown or black cigar shaped objectin the southern sky. I checked the time and it was 310 p.m. on May 11, 2004. Ihad my son check the weather channel to see what the cloud ceiling was at thetime and it was reported at 8500 feet. The sky was partly cloudy at the time ofthe siting. I observed the object for less than a minute and immediately wentinto my home to get my binoculars. When I returned outside, the object hadvanished. I checked the sky in all directions and there wasnt any sign of theobject. I, at first, thought it might be a blimp but since it disappeared.
